Shortcodes
pre-styled elements useful for customization

Button styles

LIGHT BLUE   FRESH GREEN   JUICY ORANGE

LOVELY RED   MELLOW YELLOW   PURPLE BERRY

[button link="#" style="btn_blue"]LIGHT BLUE[/button]
[button link="#" style="btn_green"]FRESH GREEN[/button]
[button link="#" style="btn_orange"]JUICY ORANGE[/button]

[button link="#" style="btn_red"]LOVELY RED[/button]
[button link="#" style="btn_yellow"]MELLOW YELLOW[/button]
[button link="#" style="btn_purple"]PURPLE BERRY[/button]
